title: Destruction E-Sports OCE LFM (Silver/Gold OCE Team)
body:
Hey Guys, I am Mount Diablo and I am making a ranked 5's team in the area of Silver/Gold. Looking for members who are reliable and love the game as much as they play it. People who can also accept critism and give it out without leaving or raging. A friendly attitude towards learning the game in different ways.
We have TS3 for team chat so having a microphone is required, Post below with your role and Favorite champions!
Current Roster:
Top: Open
Jungle: SoHo
Mid: Mount Diablo (c)
ADC: Open
Support: Open

Add Mount Diablo for a Trial!

replies.body: yo man, im bronze and would like to join, main top but can do all positions. Before you decide because im bronze, check my match history than decide. let me know, i just dont want to solo queue no more
